About.Title: Who I Am
About.Subtitle: A self-proclaimed Front-End Developer
About.Body: Hello! I'm a Electronic Engineer and a software developer with experience in design, development, and testing of software systems. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects as well as collaborate as part of a cross-functional team. Experienced in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS/SCSS, JS/TS, React.js and Angular. In addition, knowledge in backend technologies such as Ruby and Ruby on Rails.

Descriptions.Eatable: A dashboard web app for different dishes.
Descriptions.Doable: An enhance to do list web app.
Descriptions.Expensable: Web-based expense and income management application.

Card.Title: Front-End Developer
Card.Description: I am available for freelance or full-time positions. Contact me and let's talk.
